remarks: Projective subspace sum operation value.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-2011.)
statement:
paddfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddfval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddfval.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddval $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ X C_ A /\ Y C_ A ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( ( X u. Y ) u. { p e. A | E. q e. X E. r e. Y p .<_ ( q .\/ r ) } ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d K p q r $.
$d X p q $.
$d Y p q r $.
